scenario_text.value:
Boy, just when I thought I was gonna die of
boredom, things’re getting interesting!
Are you going to join the search?

Who cares about that? This tunnel! A lost
shrine!! I smell adventure, don’t you?
Ahhh, I think I see what you mean.

Right?! Might as well look for some ruins
while we look for those jokers!
Ruins? I think the joke might be on you...
What’re we waiting around here for?
